Source.Name: hyprpolkitagent
Source.Summary: A simple polkit authentication agent for Hyprland, written in QT/QML.
Source.Description: Hyprpolkitagent is a polkit authentication daemon. It is required for GUI applications to be able to request elevated privileges. Add exec-once = systemctl --user start hyprpolkitagent to your Hyprland config and restart hyprland. If Hyprland is started with uwsm, you can autostart the polkit agent with the command systemctl --user enable --now hyprpolkitagent.service. Wiki: https://wiki.hypr.land/Hypr-Ecosystem/hyprpolkitagent/
